content:
The Main Directorate of Intelligence of the Ministry of Defense of Ukraine has published interception of the conversation of Russians from the Gravoron direction of the Belgorod region.

The audio recording is posted on Gur Mow YouTube channel.

The invaders discuss the strengthening of Russian police posts on all roads.

"There were moments when we had to leave. And yesterday there were a lot of cops, from Belgorod, there are 5 of these crews at the posts," the occupier said.

“Any strengthening ... Three people should be in the post now, three people each,”-

GUR MOU stressed that for every military crime committed against Ukraine, there would be a fair retribution.

As reported by the Armyinform, representative of GUR MOU Andriy YusovcommentedA fresh statement of military formations "Russian Volunteer Corps", "Freedom of Russia" and "Siberian Battalion", calling it very significant.
title: Gur Perekholnnya: “The cops were full of Belgorod yesterday, at the posts of 5 crews standing”
description: The audio recording is posted on Gur Mow YouTube channel. The occupiers are discussing the strengthening ...
author: Army Inform
